ApplyTrafoResult.label.caption: Transformation Results
ChebyshevCFInputContainer.panel.infoPane:
The input should be a simple .txt file.

The file should consist of one or more points, each on its own line. Each point should be made up of three coordinates: x, y and z.

The input has to represent 3D-coordinates of the reality in a 2D-level.

Example:
41.3 11.2 17.1
24.2 33.1 19.8
9.1 5.4 12.9
ChebyshevCFResult.label.caption: Chebyshev Circle Fit Parameters

StartScreen.subheader.welcome: This website will help you to solve mathematical problems.
SubmitBtn.label.caption: Submit
ThreeDTrafoInputContainer.panel.infoPane:
The input should be a simple .txt file.

The file should consist of one or more points, each on its own line. Each point should be made up of three coordinates: x, y and z. These should be simple numbers.

Example:
41.3 11.2 17.1
24.2 33.1 19.8
9.1 5.4 12.9
ThreeDTrafoResult.label.caption: Transformation Parameters
ThreeDTrafoResult.link.downloadFile: Download transformed start points as .txt file
